name: Tender Submission Approval Form
description:
This form is to be used for registering all proposed submissions for funding over $20,000 from external sources (including tenders, submissions Philanthropic Bodies, local government and community funds). The Deputy CEO (Director of Innovation and Business Development) may approve all submissions for less than $150,000. 
 The Quality and Research Committee of the Board assesses all submissions and makes recommendations to the Board. The Board notes all proposals under $150,000 and approves or declines all proposals over $150,000.

fields.name: arrangements
fields.label: What are the proposed arrangements eg. Staffing Split?

fields.name: oaEstablishedPurchaserRelationship
fields.label: Does MacKillop have an established relationship with the purchaser?

fields.name: oaGoodPurchaserTrackRecord
fields.label: Does MacKillop currently have a good track record with the purchaser?

fields.name: oaMfsPositionedAhead
fields.label: Is MacKillop positioned ahead of competitors for this opportunity?

fields.name: oaMfsCurrentService
fields.label: Does MacKillop currently provide this type of service?

fields.name: oaMfsServiceCapability
fields.label: Does MacKillop have the capability to provide the service?

fields.name: oaMfsCapacityToExpand
fields.label: Does MacKillop have the capacity to expand to meet the new requirements?

fields.name: oaMfsCanMeetRequirementsInTimeframe
fields.label: Can MacKillop meet these requirements within the resources of the tender?

fields.name: oaMfsUtiliseThirdPartyService
fields.label: Does MacKillop need to utilise third party relationships to deliver the service?

fields.name: oaMfsHasExistingMou
fields.label: Does MacKillop have an existing MOU or arrangements with the third party?

fields.name: oaMfsCanEstablishNewMou
fields.label: Can an MOU be established in the required timeframe?

fields.name: oaStrategicFit
fields.label: Does the contract fit with MacKillop’s strategic intent and mission?

fields.name: oaRequirementHighScoringResponse
fields.label: Can MacKillop achieve a high scoring response in the required time time?

fields.name: oaRequirementAvailableResources
fields.label: Does MacKillop have the available resources to complete a quality response?

fields.name: oaRequirementComplianceLevel
fields.label: Is MacKillop’s level of compliance to the requirements high?

fields.name: oaRequirementServiceDeliveryModel
fields.label: Can the requirements be delivered within the framework of MacKillop’s current Service Delivery Model?

fields.name: oaRisk
fields.label: Are there any risks that should be considered on submitting for this tender?
